title: MoviePass subscribers in the U.S. 2019
summary: The statistic shows the Number of MoviePass subscribers U.S. in the country in 2019 , broken down 2019 Month .
In 2019 , MoviePass subscribers U.S. amounted to 3000 thousands , up from 3000 thousands in the previous year .
gold: As of April 2019 , it was estimated that MoviePass had just 225 thousand subscribers in the United States , a significant drop from the three million recorded in June 2018.

MoviePass is no stranger to media attention , but after the recent claims from a source that they had obtained internal data about MoviePass 's floundering subscriber base , the company is once again in the spotlight.
What is MoviePass ? MoviePass is a subscription-based movie ticketing service , designed to allow subscribers to buy a select amount of movie tickets each month for a single fee .
